S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3397: Derby 10.3.1.4 and 10.3.2.1 break scrollable result sets? Hibernate Query.setFirstResult and/or setMaxResults. This change makes setMaxRows take effect by resetting the value in the result set object to the value held in the activation. Patch file: derby-3397.diff
Patch contributed by Dag H. Wanvik.
